This person is from tele.He will pick up your job  asks to transfer first etc.His known operandi is he will pick your job and will proceed to DO and take photo of unit number.But the PU will be done by someone else as he will repost the job.EOD  both money and food will be missing.PU will be done by himself or someone else and DO POD is just for the sake of showing that the items has been "delivered".In tele quite a few has been his victims.
